issue.title: [C++] Add nightly test for static build with arrow_flight_static and arrow_bundled_dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15859](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15859). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Due to abseil dependencies static builds with arrow_bundled_dependencies are brittle. We could test them nightly with the example proposed in ARROW-14708.
